items.title: Boat crew almost ‘laughed in our faces after our luggage was swept out to sea’
items.description: Australian tourist Alice Zamparelli was left fuming

items.title: Creepy man finds ‘amazing’ dead body and calls it in to radio show instead of cops
items.description: The man, who called himself Joseph but refused to give his real name, said he was 'exploring nature and look what I came upon.'

items.title: Someone is trying to profit from Bogeyman of Liverpool’s death
items.description: 'This was not about sex this was about using and abusing the dolls with revenge in mind.'

items.title: Son puts on dead mother’s lipstick and jewellery to collect pension with her body mummified at home
items.description: The son could is now the subject of further investigations and could face charges of concealment of a corpse and fraud.

items.title: Museum invites Robert De Niro to meet his 17th century doppelganger
items.description: Museum invites Robert De Niro to meet his 17th century doppelganger
